title: Sketchbook Folio, "A Woman Supported by a Fl", 1813–16
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: Viani Bologna.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Large, magnificently winged angel supports woman on his back, floating among clouds. Winged putto supports one of woman's arms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "A Woman Supported by a Fl", 1813–16.
1813–16. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3489-a.
